    • emptyObjectSerializer

      public static <T> JsonSerializer<T> emptyObjectSerializer(com.google.common.base.Supplier<T> object)
      Creates a JsonSerializer for a empty JsonObject.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object
      Parameters:
      object - the object supplier to create an empty instance of it
      Returns:
      the created JsonSerializer

    • jsonObjectSerializer

      public static <T> JsonSerializer<T> jsonObjectSerializer(Class<T> clazz, Function<JsonObjectPath,T> toObjMapper, Function<T,com.google.gson.JsonElement> toJsonMapper)
      Creates a JsonSerializer for the provided type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object to serialize and deserialize.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the Class of the object
      toObjMapper - the deserializer from JsonObject to object
      toJsonMapper - the serializer from object to JsonElement
      Returns:
      the created JsonSerializer

    • jsonObjectSerializer
